Description: Blue glazed composition amulet in the form of a figure of Ra-Horakhty, seated and wearing sun disc and kilt, with hands on thighs, sitting on throne, feet rest on flat base, with suspension ring behind head.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.29
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1992 Jul-Oct, Norfolk, Swaffham Museum, Ancient Egypt
